data.text: Praise Yahweh!
Jerusalem was destroyed, but Yahweh is enabling us to build Jerusalem again.
He enables those who were very discouraged to be encouraged again;
He has determined how many stars there will be,
Yahweh is great and very powerful,
Yahweh lifts up those who have been oppressed,
Thank Yahweh while you are singing to him to praise him;
He covers the sky with clouds,
He gives to animals the food that they need,
He is not pleased with strong horses
Instead, what pleases him are those who revere him,
You people of [APO] Jerusalem, praise Yahweh!
He guards your city by keeping its gates strong.
He protects the borders of your country, so that enemies from other countries cannot attack you.
He commands what he wants to be done on the earth,
He sends snow which covers the ground like a white wool blanket [SIM],
He sends hail down like ◄pebbles/tiny stones►;
But he commands the wind to blow, and it blows.
He sent his message to the descendants of Jacob;
He has not done that for any other nation;
